original_definition: 'frequency quality evaluation criteria' means a set of calculations using system frequency measurements that allows the evaluation of the quality of the system frequency against the frequency quality target parameters;
generated_definition: 'frequency quality evaluation criteria' means a set of data that allows the calculation of the frequency quality evaluation criteria, including data collected by lfc block monitors and synchronous area monitors during the data collection and delivery process.
